attributes.action: Henry Smith MP to lobby Parliament on lack of education funding for Crawley.
attributes.background: West Sussex is the lowest funded County Council & 4th lowest funded Local Authority for eduction. A 4 day week is being considered. Henry Smith, MP for Crawley, should be opposing this and fighting against Crawley school children's lack of education funding.

rejection.details:
It's up to individual MPs, not the Government or Parliament as a whole, to decide which causes and campaigns to support.

You can find out how to contact your MP here:

http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
